text: The Ialomiţa River () is a river in the southern part of Romania. It comes up from the Bucegi Mountains of the Carpathians and flows into the Danube. The upper part of the river is sometimes called Valea Obârşiei River or Obârşia Ialomiţei River. ==Cities== *Târgovişte *Slobozia ==Tributaries== *Prahova River ==Lakes and dams== *Lake Scropoasa Category:Tributaries of the Danube Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Prahova County Category:Dâmbovița County Category:Ilfov County Category:Ialomița County
title: Ialomița (river)
